introduction: SYNOPSISYun-Hee felt worth of living in waiting for her husband who was studying in Berlin while she ran an art store. But one day she came to know a man called Hyeon-Ku who made love with. After her husband came back, Yun-Hee felt sense of guilty so refused to sleep with her husband. Meanwhile Hyeon-Ku was entangled in a murder case in which a woman was killed and was considered as the criminal. Yun-Hee was the only one who could testify his alibi. At last her husband understood every thing when he saw the notice to appear from the court and her family went to ruin. As You-Hee's death was near at hand due to traffic accident after straying around, her husband finally forgave her.故事佛寺经营的尹熙，在等待丈夫到柏林学习时，感受到生命的回报。然后有一天我遇到一个叫Hogu的人，一起睡。Yoonhee感到悔恨，因为她回来的丈夫分开写信给卧室。另一方面，玄县遭遇一名女子谋杀案，被处以肇事者的处罚，而云熙是唯一一个证明不在场的人。接受法院法庭命令的丈夫了解一切，家庭已经破产。正在流浪的尹熙在交通事故中丧生，丈夫原谅了她。
